Title: The Lost City of Atlantis: The Sunken Civilization
Description: Submerge into the legend of Atlantis, the fabled sunken city first mentioned by Plato. Join us as we navigate through the theories, searches, and debates surrounding this enduring mystery. #HistoricalMysteries #LostCity #Atlantis #UnderwaterArchaeology

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The legend of Atlantis, a prosperous civilization said to have sunk into the ocean, has intrigued scholars for centuries.
